official-title.#text: To provide for the termination of employment of employees of the Internal Revenue Service who take certain official actions for political purposes.

attestation-date.#text: Passed the House of Representatives July 31, 2013.

short-title.#text: Stop Targeting Our Politics IRS Act

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
is amended to
			 read as follows:
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Paragraph (10) of section 1203(b) of the
			 Internal Revenue Service Restructuring and Reform Act of 1998
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Internal Revenue Service Restructuring and Reform Act of 1998/s:1203/ss:b/p:10

header.#text: Termination of employment of Internal Revenue Service employees for taking official actions for political purposes

text.#text: performing, delaying, or failing to perform (or threatening to perform, delay, or fail to perform) any official action (including any audit) with respect to a taxpayer for purpose of extracting personal gain or benefit or for a political purpose.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 2565 EH: Stop Targeting Our Politics IRS Act

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}rights.#text: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
